verses.1: Hihte pen Noahʼ tapa Shem, Ham le Jafeth-teʼ suanlekhakte ahi hi. Tuiciin tun khit ciangin amau sung panin tapate hong piang hi.
verses.2: Jafethʼ tapate: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan le Tiras ahi hi.
verses.3: Gomerʼ tapate: Ashkenaz, Rifath le Togarmah ahi hi.
verses.4: Javanʼ tapate: Elishah, Tarshish, Kittim le Dodanim ahi hi.
verses.5: Hihte pen tuipi gei-a teeng miteʼ pulepa ahi uh hi. Amauteʼ leitang ah amauʼ kampau ciat zangin, a beh, a minamin a om uh hi.
verses.6: Hamʼ tapate: Kush, Egypt, Put le Kanaan ahi hi.
verses.7: Kushʼ tapate: Seba, Havilah, Sabtah, Raamah le Sabteka ahi hi. Raamahʼ tapate: Sheba le Dedan ahi hi.
verses.8: Kush in Nimrod kici tapa khat nei a, amah pen leitungah a vanglian masa mi ahi hi.
verses.9: Amah pen Topaʼ mai ah a minthang sabeng pa zong ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin, “ Topa in Nimrod bangin a minthang sabeng pa hong suaksak tahen,” kici hi.
verses.10: Ama kumpi gam kipatna Babel, Erek le Akkad hi a, tuate khempeuh Shinar gam sungah om hi.
verses.11: Tua gam panin Assiria gam sungah amah pai-in Nineveh, Rehoboth-Ir, Kalah le
verses.12: Nineveh le Kalah kikal a om Resen khuapite a sat hi. Tua Kalah khuapi pen khuapi lian ahi hi.
verses.13: Egypt pen Lud mite, Anam mite, Lehab mite, Naftuh mite,
verses.14: Pathru mite, Kasluh mite (Filistia miteʼ pianna) le Kaftor miteʼ pianna pupi ahi hi.
verses.15: Kanaan pen ama sung pan a suak masa Sidon, Heth,
verses.16: le Jebus mite, Amor mite, Girgash mite,
verses.17: Hiv mite, Arki mite, Sin mite,
verses.18: Arvad mite, Zemari mite le Hamath miteʼ pianna pupi ahi hi. Tua khit ciangin Kanaan mite kizelthang hi.
verses.19: Kanaan miteʼ gam pen Sidon panin kipanin Gerar lam manawhin Gaza ciang dong ban a, Sodom lam panin Gomorrah, Admah le Lasha gei-a Zeboiim ciang dong ban hi.
verses.20: Hihte pen a innkuan, a kampau, a leitang, a minamin Hamʼ suanlekhakte ahi hi.
verses.21: Eber mi khempeuhʼ pianna pupi, Jafethʼ u, Shemʼ sung panin zong tate hong piang hi.
verses.22: Shemʼ tapate: Elam, Asshur, Arpakshad, Lud le Aram ahi hi.
verses.23: Aramʼ tapate: Uz, Hul, Gether le Mash ahi hi.
verses.24: Arpakshad in Shelah kici tapa khat nei a, Shelah in Eber kici tapa khat mah nei hi.
verses.25: Eberʼ sung panin tapa nih suak a, khatʼ min pen Peleg ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama hunin leitung kikhen hi. A sanggampaʼ min pen Joktan ahi hi.
verses.26: Joktan pen Almodad, Shelef, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
verses.29: Ofir, Havilah le Jobabʼ pianna pa ahi hi. Hihte khempeuh Joktanʼ tapate ahi hi.
verses.30: Amauʼ teenna gam pen Mesha panin kipanin Sefar lamah nisuahna gam mual tung dong ban hi.
verses.31: Hihte pen a innkuan, a kampau, a leitang, a minamin Shemʼ suanlekhakte ahi hi.
verses.32: Hihte pen Noahʼ tapate innkuan, a khangsimna tawh kizui-in amauʼ minam ahi hi. Tuiciin tun khit ciangin hihte tung panin leitungah minamte kizelthang hi.
